data: Hello, Commander. You will be using our new combat management system. Let me provide you with a brief introduction on how to use it.
The top bar displays, from left to right: our base's health points, our technology points, the next wave of enemies, our funds, and interest rate.
You can hover over each icon at any time during the game to view more information.
In the corners of the screen, you'll find buttons to return to the menu, call the next wave, toggle the music, and toggle the sound effects.
Grukkle minions spawn in waves from the spawn portals. A timer next to the next wave icon shows when the following wave will arrive.
You must destroy every minion before they reach our base's portal. Otherwise, they will teleport to the spawn, causing us to lose health points.
We've obtained a technology elixir. This allows us to build stronger towers with special effects.
Ember specializes in targeted damage, Crystal in energy pulses and positive effects, and Flux in powerful negative effects.
Select a technology to begin with. Then, click on a conduit on the map to construct a tower and combat the first wave of Grukkles.
